title: How to Make a Realistic Earth in Blender in 20 mins

media:group.media:title: How to Make a Realistic Earth in Blender in 20 mins
media:group.media:description:
Blender tutorial showing you the surprisingly easy method to create a photorealistic earth. Using 100% Blender and some textures from the good ole boys and gals at NASA.

Download NASA Textures: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/1rxblwi19i78ieh/AADNsHNRA7SysJ015GkXplewa?dl=0
Download NASA Reference Photos: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/3ghuz4477c45aw7/AAAlo1-kNTQMqLPHzqRwkZFba?dl=0
Download the new Poliigon Addon: https://www.poliigon.com/blender?utm_campaign=addon&utm_source=yt&utm_medium=bg&utm_content=tut
NASA Imagery Use Policy: https://visibleearth.nasa.gov/image-use-policy

Join my free email newsletter: https://www.blenderguru.com/thisweekin3D
